name: Space Spices
description:
Made in 3 hours for "Trijam #176: The 3 hour game jam"

------------------

A spaceship carrying spices must reach the teleporter but many space pirates want to steal it.

Your job is to destroy all the pirates and make sure the spices arrive safely.

-To shoot, left click-

-To move, ASWD or the arrows key-

-You can also use your body to destroy enemies.
